title: Out of school and into marriage: 39,000 girls forced to marry every day (CARE Australia) ...
text: ( Source : CARE Australia ) By Dylan Quinnell October 9, 2015 Girls in 26 countries are more likely to be forced into marriage than to enroll in secondary school, research from CARE has found. The report, Vows of Poverty , has been released to
